title: Charlotte Crosby FINALLY responds to Stephen Bear hooking up with other girls on Celebs Go Dating behind her back
text:
TV Magazine 'I'M A SUCKER FOR PAIN' Charlotte Crosby FINALLY responds to Stephen Bear hooking up with other girls on Celebs Go Dating behind her back 
Bear hooked up with two girls on the E4 reality show while he was secretly dating Charlotte By ELAINE MCCAHILL Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CHARLOTTE Crosby has FINALLY responded to Stephen Bear hooking up with two other girls on Celebs Go Dating behind her back. 
The Sun Online revealed exclusive footage which shows Bear asking one girl if she â€œfancies a sh*g?â€ on the E4 reality show while he was secretly dating Charlotte. E4 Charlotte Crosby has finally responded after The Sun revealed he had hooked up with two girls behind her back on Celebs Go Dating Instagram Charlotte Crosby and Bear have been secretly dating since late last year Twitter 
Taking to Twitter, Charlotte hinted at the recent drama with the Celebrity Big Brother winner and wrote: â€œIâ€™m just a sucker for pain, what can I sayâ€¦.â˜ ï¸.â€ 
Bear then responded saying: â€œ@Charlottegshore cool story ğŸ¤¹ğŸ¿â€â™€ï¸â€ to which she repleid: â€œH very interestingâ€. 
Bear was sensationally â€œsackedâ€ from the E4 dating show when his relationship with Charlotte was uncovered, and The Sun Online exclusively revealed that he had told Charlotte he was only doing it for the money and â€œwasnâ€™t interestedâ€ in any of the girls. 
A source close to Charlotte told us: â€œCharlotte was slow to confirm the relationship because she wasnâ€™t sure what Bear was getting up to while he was filming Celebs Go Dating. Stephen Bear dealt embarrassing blow as 'blue lips' Stacy refuses to go home with him 
â€œShe knows what the show is like and what can happen but he kept reassuring her that he wasnâ€™t interested in any of the girls. 
â€œHe kept saying he was only doing it for the money and it wasnâ€™t about hooking up with other women. 
â€œHe told her that nothing happened with any of the girls he went on dates with and that he was crazy about her.â€ Related stories Break ups and bust ups Hollyoaks spoilers: John Paul McQueen takes drastic action to stop rapist Finn's release as he cheats on James with ex-husband Ste Hay GET HER A SCARF Kim Kardashian shows off surprisingly smooth complexion in New York... but her boobs take centre stage DON'T CRUTCH ME NOW The Jump's Vogue Williams looks glamorous on a night out...with her crutches in tow TV PICKS What's on TV tonight? Shows to watch on Friday 17 February from Piers Morgan's Life Stories to Not Going Out JAMIE EAST AT THE MOVIES The Great Wall is a fun Sinbad-style romp â€” despite some hilariously bad performances Wrapped up in Love Leggy Kelly Brook steps out looking loved-up with hunky French beau Jeremy Parisi in Malibu ESSEX DRAMA Danielle Armstrong avoids awkward run-in with ex James Lock as they arrive at the same restaurant YOU CAN'T PUT A PRICE ON LOVE Who has Katie Price been married to and how many children does she have? BAD PARENTING Katie Price slams children raised to mock others with disabilities as she shows off flat tummy on Instagram Hello baby! Amy Childs shares the first ever picture of her unborn baby in close up 4D scan picture of her WOMB CITY OF LOVE Newly engaged Lisa Snowdon and fiance George Smart spotted enjoying a romantic walk in Paris DYER STRAITS Troubled Danny Dyer forced to QUIT EastEnders and 'sort his life out' after string of benders following failed attempt to quit booze 
Bear was also filmed kissing two other women proving that he was far more up for fully immersing himself in the dating show than what he had led Charlotte to believe. 
Bearâ€™s shocking behaviour comes after he revealed he wants to have a baby next year â€“ after joking that Charlotte is pregnant with his child last week. Instagram 9 Bear was sacked from Celebs Go Dating when bosses discovered he was dating Charlotte 
Asked whatâ€™s going on with the two of them, Bear told OK! mag: â€œSheâ€™s [Charlotte] pregnant with my baby [laughs]! 
â€œNo, Charlotte ticks a lot of my boxes â€“ sheâ€™s funny, witty, clever, sheâ€™s got all the right attributes, but as Iâ€™m filming Celebs Go Dating. 
â€œItâ€™s a case of right girl, wrong time. But who knows what will happen in the future.â€ Stephen Bear ditches his date before starters served on Celebs Go Dating 
In scenes that aired tonight, Bear appears to be overly enthusiastic when meeting a prospective date in a restaurant. 
â€œDo you believe in love at first sight?â€ he asks his date as she suggests she might. E4 Bear excuses himself to use the bathroom - but takes his coat with him E4 9 His poor date is oblivious that he is planning to run away 
Bear immediately shifts conversation to sex, by crudely asking: â€œWhen shall we make babies?â€ â€“ prompting his date to laugh nervously. 
As a waiter approaches to take their order, Bear asks for a glass of water before excusing himself to go to the bathroom. E4 9 Bear complains to the camera that he can't go through with the date 
Turning to the waiter, he asks: â€œHave you got a toilet, mate? I'm so sorry... my bladder is killing me.â€ 
Bear then ensures his date has her drink order in place and also suggests some garlic bread and cheese for a start before excusing himself for the bathroom â€“ taking his jacket with him. E4 9 Bear runs away after ordering water and garlic bread 
As he departs, he even says to his date: â€œBabe - don't you be kissing anyone else,â€ and begs her to â€œStay there.â€ 
He then risks humiliating his date as he makes a desperate dash away from the table and tells the camera crew he intends to ditch the date altogether. E4 9 He tells the dating agency that his date wasn't what he was expecting 
â€œI can't lie... she's nothing like I was expecting,â€ Bear explained â€“ even though his first words involved love at first site and a lust to impregnate his date. 
â€œI gotta get out of here. It's not for me. I can't. I can't do it. I'll be honest with you, it's not for me,â€ he adds to the crew. 
Celebs Go Dating continues on E4.
